name: audiospectra-cli
description: A real-time audio spectrum visualizer and analyzer integrated into VS Code, allowing users to visualize FFT spectra from audio inputs directly within the editor. Customize frequency ranges, color schemes, and more using Pythonâ€™s AudioSpectraCLI module.

scripts.compile: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
